Incapacitated: One player may play one card now
Reduce all damage dealt by 2 until the start of your next turn
Name: Haka

Savage Mana.text:
Whenever Haka destroys a Target, you may put that card beneath this card.
	Power: Destroy all cards beneath this card. Haka deals 1 Target X Toxic Damage, where X = the number of cards destroyed this way times 2.

Rampage.text: Haka deals each non-Hero Target 5 Melee Damage and each Hero Target 2 Melee Damage.

Haka of Battle.text: Draw 2 cards, then discard 1 or more cards. Increase the next Damage dealt by Haka by 1 for each card discarded this way.

Haka of Restoration.text: Draw 2 cards, then discard 1 or more cards. Haka regains HP equal to the number of cards discarded this way.

Haka of Shielding.text: Draw 2 cards, then discard 1 or more cards. Reduce the next Damage dealt to Haka by 2 for each card discarded this way.

Vitality Surge.text: Haka regains 2 HP. Draw a card.

Dominion.text: Whenever an Environment card is destroyed, you may draw a card.

Enduring Intercession.text:
Redirect any Damage that would be dealt to a Hero Target by an Environment card to Haka.
	Power: Destroy this card.

Ground Pound.text: When this card enters play, discard 2 cards or destroy this card. Non-Hero cards cannot deal Damage. At the start of your turn, destroy this card.

Punish the Weak.text:
Whenever Haka would Damage the non-Hero Target with the lowest HP, increase that Damage by 1. Whenever Haka would Damage any other Target, reduce that Damage by 1.
	Power: Destroy this card.

Ta Moko.text: Reduce Damage dealt to Haka by 1.

Mere.text: Power: Haka deals 1 Target 2 Melee Damage. Draw a card.

Taiaha.text: Power: Haka deals up to 2 Targets 3 Melee Damage each.
